name: PowerApp
description: A tool to extend the functionality of your Todoist account by integrating it with third-party applications

SECRET_KEY.description: A secret key for verifying the integrity of signed cookies.

TODOIST_CLIENT_ID.description: Create your client at https://developer.todoist.com/appconsole.html and copy your personal client id from there

TODOIST_CLIENT_SECRET.description: Create your client at https://developer.todoist.com/appconsole.html and copy your personal client secret from there

POWERAPP_SERVICES.description: Optional space-separated list of PowerApp services (packages from PyPI or git repos)
